title.rendered: Nulaxy Bluetooth Wireless Earbuds, True Wireless Stereo Earbuds with Portable Charging Case, Touch Control, Built-in Mic…

content.rendered:
Make positive this suits by getting into your mannequin quantity.
【Incredible Stereo Sound】:The clear stereo sound of Nulaxy Wireless Earbuds brings you an immersive music expertise and enjoyable music time. With the Bluetooth V5.0, the music transmission between Bluetooth earphones and gadget might be extra secure. The built-in extremely delicate microphone and DSP noise discount know-how mean you can have clear calls.
【16-Hour Playtime】: The Wireless Earbuds can playback about 4 hours of music per cost. The totally charged charging field can prolong about 3.5 instances of charging for the Bluetooth headphones. The large-capacity charging field provides you much less charging instances and extra listening time. Feel free to take pleasure in uninterrupted playtime with Nulaxy true wi-fi stereo Earbuds.
【One-step Pairing & Memory Function】: After you open the charging field, you solely must activate the Bluetooth in your gadget, search for” Nulaxy S28” and join, then you’ll be able to benefit from the music. Both earphones can be utilized individually, you need to use in accordance with your wants. The 2 true wi-fi stereo earphones will routinely connect with your gadget after the primary connection.
【Smart Touch Control】: With the contact sensor, you’ll be able to contact the multi-function button to play/pause (Tap as soon as), reply/cling up calls (Tap as soon as), swap tracks (Double faucet), activate voice assistant (Triple faucet), flip off the ability of earphones (lengthy press for 5 seconds), and so forth.
【Ergonomic Design & Compact Size】: Ultra-light weight can scale back the burden in your ears; Ergonomic form design completely suits your ears. In addition, the TWS Earbuds can also be outfitted with three totally different sizes of ear-tips (S/M/L) to fulfill totally different wants and higher sealing impact, offering a superb music expertise. The earphones and charging case designed extra compact and lighter (the entire weight is 14g) is simple to hold. It would be the good music companion in your journey.
